subject: Re: [junit] Re: About the value of JUnit
msgSnippet: ... Hash: SHA1 Hi, ... That s impossible. It s not possible to automate Unit Testing any further than the way JUnit already does it. What can be automated is
messageBody:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Hi,


Am Freitag, 4. April 2003 08:22 schrieb javainsel:
> It seems that it includes and substitutes JUnit and has more features
> than JUnit. And it seems to automate testing as far as possible, thus
> making testing more productive.
That's impossible.
It's not possible to automate Unit Testing any further than the way JUnit
already does it.
What can be automated is the *generation* of Unit tests.


Bye
